articles.description: This week’s Android headlines; Samsung’s big plans for the Galaxy Z Flip 4, Google’s new photography tool, OnePlus Nord 2T review, Huawei’s folding Mate Xs 2 coming to Europe, Chrome problems in Russia, Qualcomm’s market share, and more...
articles.content: Taking a look back at seven days of news and headlines across the world of Android, this weeks Android Circuit includes Samsungs big plans for the Galaxy Z Flip 4, Googles new photography tool, OnePl… [+6483 chars]
